name: GoUrl MarketPress – Bitcoin Altcoin Payment Gateway Addon
author: GoUrl.io

sections.description:
See Screenshots

WordPress Plugin for MarketPress Features –

  • 100% Free Open Source Plugin on Github.com
  • Provides a Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway for MarketPress 2.9 or higher
  • Accept Bitcoin, BitcoinCash, Litecoin, Dash, Dogecoin, Speedcoin, Reddcoin, Potcoin, Feathercoin, Vertcoin, Peercoin, MonetaryUnit payments in MarketPress
  • No Monthly Fee, Transaction Fee from 0%
  • Product Prices in USD/EUR/GBP/etc. Google/Bitstamp/Poloniex Live Exchange Rates
  • Direct Integration on your website, no external payment pages opens (as other payment gateways offer)
  • You will see the bitcoin/altcoin payment statistics in one common table on your website.
  • No Chargebacks, Global, Secure. All in automatic mode.
  • Free Tech Support for You

Plugin Page: https://gourl.io/bitcoin-payments-wpmudev-marketpress.html

Twitter: https://twitter.com/CryptocoinAPI

Github: https://github.com/cryptoapi/Bitcoin-Payments-MarketPress
sections.installation:
Requirements

You need to install also –

  • MarketPress Plugin
  • GoUrl Main WordPress Gateway Plugin

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of GoUrl Bitcoin/Altcoin Gateway for MarketPress, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “GoUrl MarketPress” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the the rating and description. Most importantly, of course, you can install it by simply clicking Install Now¬ù.

Manual Installation

  • Go to WordPress Plugins > Add New
  • Click Upload Plugin Zip File
  • Upload the zipped gourl_wordpress file and click “Upload Now”
  • Go to Installed Plugins
  • Activate the “GoUrl MarketPress – Bitcoin Altcoin Payment Gateway Addon”

IMPORTANT – Optional support HTML in Transaction Notes

Marketpress doesn’t support html in notes by default, and you need to add support –
Open file wordpress-ecommerce/marketpress.php, find text below (line 5324) and remove “esc_html”

Read here: https://gourl.io/bitcoin-payments-wpmudev-marketpress.html#notes
